attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Asylum Seekers escaping dangers in their own country must be prepared to become British Citizens with loyalty to the Monarch. 
Visitor and Resident Status should not qualify for benefits of any kind - except those entitled under EU Membership.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
